item.title: Debugging and autocompletion for Unreal Engine 4 and 5 projects in (Neo)Vim
item.author: james922@163.com (James)
item.description: Autocompletion For autocompletion there are two options: coc (Vim, Neovim) LSP (Neovim only) In my experience, coc is easier to set up. If you want to get started as quickly as possible, this is your best bet. Coc Install coc.vim, e.g. with vim-plug inside .vimrc: Plug 'neoclide/coc.nvim' Run :CocInstall coc-clangd You will likely have to familiarize yourself with coc’s shortcuts first or customize it as you see fit. LSP Setting up LSP takes a bit of time but for those that already have it up and running, there is probably not much to do.
item.dc:creator: James
